property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: A minigame room in which the [[party]] can play the [[Rock Video]] minigame. Only available if all [[TV World]] Darkners were [[recruit]]ed.

property.name: page
property.value: TV Studio#Rhythm minigame room

property.name: description
property.value: [[Mike]]'s secret room in the TV Studio, available if [[Shadowguy]], [[Zapper]], and [[Pippins]] are [[recruit]]ed.

property.name: page
property.value: TV Studio#Mike's room

property.name: description
property.value: A minigame room, unlocked after defeating the [[Mike]]s. Inserting any of the Mikes in the Mike slot initiates a minigame.

property.name: page
property.value: Mike minigames

property.name: description
property.value: ''The PASSWORD is 6453! Don't forget it...!''

properties.property: RHYTHM GAME! Press the buttons in time with the notes to get a high score! Ask PIPPINS and SHADOWGUY for more details!

property.name: description
property.value: Allows the player to adjust their device's microphone sensitivity. On Nintendo Switch 2, it instead allows the player to adjust their mouse sensitivity.

property.name: description
property.value: Allows the player to adjust their device's microphone sensitivity. On Nintendo Switch 2, it instead allows the player to adjust their mouse sensitivity.

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point in the TV Studio lobby.

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point near the entrance to the battle room.

property.name: description
property.value: A locked door. Is unlocked by inputting the code 6453.

property.name: description
property.value: The door to the battle room. Must be unlocked by speaking loud enough into the device's microphone. On Nintendo Switch 2, the door must be opened by pushing both sections in opposite directions.

property.name: description
property.value: A door for the [[Rock Video]] minigame cover of ''[[Raise Up Your Bat]]''.

property.name: description
property.value: A door for the [[Rock Video]] minigame cover of ''[It's TV Time]]''.

property.name: description
property.value: A door for the [[Rock Video]] minigame cover of ''[[Knock You Down!! (Rhythm Ver.)]]''.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] questions if they should be in Mike's room. [[Susie]] asks whether he is curious on who [[Mike]] is.

property.name: description
property.value: Welcomes the [[party]] to the TV Studio and explains the available facilities.

property.name: description
property.value: Explains that the [[Shadowguy]] manning the desk enjoys his job.

property.name: description
property.value: Makes unintelligible saxophone noises when asked for help.

property.name: description
property.value: Explains hints on how to achieve a high score in the minigames.

property.name: description
property.value: A small cat statue blocking the way forward. It must be removed by interacting with it and choosing to pet it.

property.name: description
property.value: A small cat statue blocking the way forward. It must be removed by interacting with it and choosing to pet it.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen cowering in front of the cat statue. Removing the statue causes the Mause to transform into a hand controlled by the mouse/controller. On the Nintendo Switch 2 version, there are two Maice which transform into two hands controlled by the Joy-Con 2's mouse controls.

property.name: description
property.value: Tall cat statues block the way forward. They must be removed using the Maus. On the Nintendo Switch 2, there are two pairs of cat statues that must be removed using the corresponding colored Maus.

property.name: description
property.value: Hats on top of high shelves. Can be picked up using the Maus.

property.name: description
property.value: Drewer that can be opened to reveal a hat inside.

property.name: description
property.value: A photorealistic microphone, revealed after waiting long enough at the end of the room.

property.name: description
property.value: Resets all minigame scores.

property.name: description
property.value: Hosts the [[Battat]] minigame, or the [[Pluey]] minigame on Nintendo Switch 2.

property.name: description
property.value: Hosts the [[Jongler]] minigame, or the [[Air Waves]] minigame on Nintendo Switch 2.

property.name: description
property.value: Hosts the [[Pluey]] minigame, or the [[Main Performance]] minigame on Nintendo Switch 2.

property.name: description
property.value: Removing this cat statue using the Maus reveals a treasure chest containing a TV Dinner.

property.name: page
property.value: TV Dinner

property.name: description
property.value: Boss battle against the three impostor Mikes.

property.name: page
property.value: Mike#In battle
